name: PizzaMaker
0:
”Alexa open Pizza Maker”
”Alexa tell Pizza Maker to start a game”
”Alexa tell Pizza Maker I want to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pizza maker
des: A game that tests your memory and problem solving skills by selecting different toppings and adhering to the feedback to create the perfect pizza for Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
